review: I bought this for my husband and he loves it! Our tv doesn't have the "smart" app options, so by plugging this in we have access to them!
author: S. Slater

review: Great things come in small packages. This thing works amazing with a very low power footprint. Lots of things you can do with it, much more than my roku and Apple TV, though I do still like my Apple TV.  I'll get theFire TV box soon to replace my current roku. kodi works well on this little thing
author: Carlton J. Hebert "CABEAR"

review: This is better than nothing, but I am having trouble because it cuts out every few minutes. I was looking for a way to watch Amazon Prime on our extra TV, but this isn't the solution. I am disappointed it doesn't work better.
author: Theresa Ramos

review: I ordered it from eBay no problems enjoying my firestick
author: TERESA CANNADYTEAL

review: I like it because i can see movie from many channels like youtuce, amazon prime, netfilx. I used Chromecast before and I like the Chromecast app better. I can find the videos on youtube by typing name directly through the phone. For Fire stick, i have to use arrow. If they fix this feature, it will like it more.
author: Patti

review: Great for the apps and streaming, no complaints, but if you want a device just to mirror phone or tablet I recommend Chromecast.
author: Jay W

review: To be honest, I hate the fire stick. Instead of spending $40 on the fire stick; I should have just got cable. Because to use any of the things that are advertised, you have to have subscriptions: HBO Go, Encore, History Channel, ect. The thing I learned about the Amazon Fire Stick is that, its a really cool way to access everything you have to have a subscription for. The Fire Stick is poorly represted as to what it actually is/does. You have to keep it plugged in. I basically spent $40 to do everything I can do on my game system. So, to me the Fire Stick was a waste of money.
author: Steffanie Taylor

review: Awesome! I thought not having a keyboard would be a pain! Doesn't bother me at all! Love it!
author: Ashlee Mattox
